com.android.rhtunning
类 TunningActivity.MyCallBack

java.lang.Object
  com.android.rhtunning.TunningActivity.MyCallBack
包容类：
TunningActivity
 class TunningActivity.MyCallBack
extends java.lang.Object

A MyCallBack object is used to start the DrawImage thread and the GetFrequency thread after the surface is created.

构造方法摘要
TunningActivity.MyCallBack()
           
 
方法摘要
 void surfaceChanged(SurfaceHolder holder, int format, int width, int height)
          Triggered when the surface is changed.
 void surfaceCreated(SurfaceHolder holder)
          Triggered when the surface is created.

          Triggered when the surface is Destroyed.

surfaceChanged

public void surfaceChanged(SurfaceHolder holder,
                           int format,
                           int width,
                           int height)
Triggered when the surface is changed.

surfaceCreated

public void surfaceCreated(SurfaceHolder holder)
Triggered when the surface is created. Some operations on the canvas can only be done after the surface is created.

surfaceDestroyed

Triggered when the surface is Destroyed.
